I blame being single on my parents, for bringing me into the world with a birth defect.

When I was in school I never had many friends and nobody really knew me, going to school was just an obligation I had to fulfil I was not fond of studies at all. 8 years of school I saw many girls but I never fell in love with anyone. There were boy’s around me who were in relationships I would ask them how matured are you ?do you even know the meaning of love? I used to think everybody is silly but then during my last 2 years I met a girl I don’t know if was destined or it was an accident. I was trying to hit one of my friends with a chalk and it accidentally hit her and it almost hit her in the right eye the area turned red i was sure she would slap me or complain to the principal but no!!she came to me I said I’m very sorry and she made sure that guilt that I had goes away she just told me to smile and forget whatever happened. I told her I was trying to hit my friend but i accidentally hit you she just told me it’s okay I believe you. The way she spoke it still feels like it just happened 5 minutes ago the mannerisms the voice the way she was looking at me my God she was just an Angel..I had never seen a girl in this world who was that beautiful God!!everything about her was like a dream be it her face, her eyes, her aura,her hair.. I don’t know when and how I fell in love with her Now it was our last year of school that’s the 10th year 😕I used to sit behind her so in some time we became friends. We exchanged numbers started messaging this was before WhatsApp i mean like text messages late night chats..Then my friends knew how much I was crazy about her so they forced me to propose her and foolishly I did she rejected me..I went into serious depression like really why did she reject me? I don’t drink I don’t smoke what’s wrong with me ? somehow I gave my exams and I passed...

Then suddenly after 3 years I saw her walking on the road while I was in a bus my God I still remember how happy I was to see her that day she didn’t see me but I was so energetic so nice to everybody around me. Everyone wondered why I was so happy? To be honest she makes me feel like I’m the strongest person In this world I can achieve anything I can defeat anyone...

But then in reality she was in a committed relationship with a boy who was older than her I was like this is not serious and they are going to break up at some point but no..just to see her beautiful face again I started to find out where she stays so that I could just see her once again..that would make my day or even my life..but I never got to see or talk to her again she’s just not interested..People tell me to forget her but it’s not that easy I don’t know why all these years she has been coming in my dreams even when I don’t think of her she’s just there!! in my subconscious mind. I pray to God to let me forget her like i just never met her or these events never took place. I’m a lonely guy who wanted nothing but companionship I respect women I’m a virgin and I look at girls in a very respectful manner..people say rich guys get beautiful girls..must be true I’m decently rich but that’s got me nothing. No girl looks at me!!forget about having a conversation they just ignore and walk away..well girls just don’t appear from the sky I have been told !! I was advised to use a dating app. I was on at least 10 dating apps and 2 marriages making apps for 6 months like imagine I tried so hard to get a girl...but no girl approached me back. Now I feel my existence is worthless i don’t know why I’m still alive why I’m breathing..? I don’t celebrate any festivals including birthdays it’s been years now every year I come up with some excuse to not celebrate because my parents are not aware of how tired I am of living..

what I know is that I’m a cursed soul so I’m just waiting for death now.Even if I die there’s no one who will shed a tear even my parents they’ll forget me in like 2 days after I’m cremated. I have no purpose to live but I do have a carrier but no idea for whom I’m studying for whom I’ll earn and on whom I’ll spent?? Since the day I was born I saw nothing but sadness now I’m completely damaged I hope I leave this world soon.. no one can understand my agony and pain I’m so lonely and abandoned that’s why now I’ve detached myself from the world

Let's see, I'm in my thirties and have been single my whole life. From the age of 10 to 24, I was bullied/rejected and had no in real life friends despite many efforts to reach out and connect with others. Then I moved in with a roommate and had many, many social interactions by proxy. I thought they were my friends. I was insecure and naive due to my inexperience. I finally came to the realization that I was being used and moved out of roommate's place, then all those "friends" immediately cut ties and spread rumors about me. I moved states several times since but have remained alone since. Likely due to my fear of being used again.  I don't necessarily have a problem with talking to others but I tend to only do so out of necessity like a work setting. I do have trouble expressing myself at times, and I have trouble interacting with groups of people. I am far more comfortable in one on one. I do get lonely but I rationalize that it's better to be in my current situation where I have control, than to put myself in a situation that I don't have control over. I guess I have trust issues and a fear of being betrayed if I were to commit to someone. I also have trouble with flirting and interpreting flirting from women. I honestly can't tell. Moreover, most women my age are or have been in long term relationships. I also have a fear of being abandoned or having my property acquired (split) by the courts in the event a woman wanted to break it off. Another fear I have would be a partner falsely accusing me of wrongdoing in order to mess my life up. It all might sound irrational but I've heard many stories from coworkers and family. I guess all these thoughts running through my head prevent me from making any effort to not be single.

Another problem is a lot of the people who most want relationships or enter relationships are actually the ones who should be single.

For a lot of people, when they love a person, they want to change them into what they believe is the ideal partner. They don’t understand that you should leave them to be themselves as long as they don’t hurt others.

This leads to people harassing (all the commotion about “texting back”) or even straight up abusing their partner. They’re so desperate for companionship that they don’t even care about the other person’s wellbeing. And thus they lose their partner because of this.

People are more attracted to the romcom idea of love instead of the real thing and when they realise that romcom love isn’t real, they again, try to create that love by any means necessary, even if it means hurting someone.

Most people either don’t understand the trust, acceptance, and responsibility needed to be in a relationship or don’t want to do it at all. And those people should be single but they’re the ones seeking out relationships all the time.

And the people who DO understand what true love really is are often the ones who don’t desire it.

I rather work on myself first before going into a relationship and let time do it's thing cause I don't want to burden anyone and I want things to happen when its the right time and not rush it XD Never been in a relationship but I've learned from just going after guys that I thought were cute and had some idea that they might like me back but in reality most of them were jerks or pulled tricks on me to make me believe that they like me, that in order to be love someone, you have to love yourself. Growing up that was one thing that I struggled with. I had very low self-esteem and I believed that I was going to die alone. I used to look at couples when i was in middle school ( I know its stupid) and longed for someone to love me for who i am. Took me until I was 16 to be truly happy with myself. Still, i ended up rushing into things when I was in high school cause my sister met her husband in high school and I thought that ill at least date someone in high school. But since in an awkward introvert, I always ended up being the one that takes liking someone to a whole new level ( running away when they're in view) and making it obvious. And since I never had things to talk about to get close, nothing happens. Now I'm 18 and I never had a bf. Lesson of the story: Work on yourself first. If you become attracted to someone, take your time to get to know them and learn how to talk to them without freaking out. If they feel the same it'll happen. And you dont need someone to make you happy. That's why I'm still friends with the guy I like right now. I can talk to him fine and I want to get closer through time.

My early home life was full of fighting, both physical and verbal. I had very little comfort and emotional connection to either of my parents. Then I went into the public school system and was picked on and made fun of there. Intellectually, I know that I can try to combat the effects of such early experiences now that I'm older, but it doesn't seem to make it much easier. I may be alone for the rest of my life, but at least I'm not a serial killer, heh.

It has been said that "hurt people hurt people"--not always. Sometimes we learn that humans are similar to us and we assume that they feel pain as we do. This made me far more prone to empathize with others and eschew imposing painful experiences upon others. Sometimes this extreme sensitivity shuts me down in social environments, leading to a kind of consciously-self-imposed isolation. I'm tired of being hurt by others, so it would take a really rare circumstance for me to enter into an intimate relationship anymore. She'd probably have to be as awkward as I am, meaning we'd never meet each other because of that fact. Bittersweet.

Peace.
